trends: There have been 404 other sightings in Los Angeles
There were no other sightings in Los Angeles on or around November 15th 2007
divs: Sighting DetailsI saw a large formation of lights in a horizontal line, they all varied in size. There was a large light off center and smaller ones on either side. The lights were red, white and orange, and twinkled. I would guess that there was approximately 10-15 lights blinking. It looked like a group of fire engine lights, but they were about a mile up and at about a distance of 5 miles from me. The object was stationary. I watched it while at a red light and then I had to turn. I do not know how long the object was there. But it was fascinating.
Summary: multi color lights mostly orange, red and white in a linear formation
